REVIEW FINDINGS - CR-039

- title: 'SOP-003 alignment corrections' - PRESENT
- revision_summary: 'Initial draft' - PRESENT

DOCUMENT STRUCTURE: All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 are present.

CURRENT STATE VERIFICATION:
- Section 4 claim verified: SOP-003 line 48 contains 'The Lead has discretion to determine when an INV is warranted.' - CONFIRMED
- Section 6 claim verified: SOP-003 line 150 contains 'numbered as INV-XYZ-CAPA-NNN' - CONFIRMED

PROPOSED STATE: Clear and well-defined changes for both sections.

CHANGE DESCRIPTION: Complete with current vs. proposed code blocks for both changes.

PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: None found in pre-approved sections (Sections 1-9).

TYPO/ERROR CHECK: None found.

FORMATTING: Consistent throughout.

TRACEABILITY: References CR-037, CR-038 (parent context), SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-003.

FINDING: COMPLIANT

This CR is properly structured, accurately documents the current state of SOP-003, and proposes clear corrections aligned with the SOP harmonization effort from CR-037 and CR-038.

POST-REVIEW FINDINGS - CR-039

All EIs have Pass outcomes: VERIFIED

- Confirms SOP-003 EFFECTIVE at v3.0 - VERIFIED
